data.text:
@CrabbBrendan For those commenting on HK, almost all deaths are the very old & with pre-existing conditions. So rates are similar as for flu/pneumonia.
Also, entire population has been the “Boy in the Bubble” for 2 years, 100% masks, distancing, vaxpass, closed schools, maniacal sanitising.
@RedJules4 @CrabbBrendan @drpete00 Then honestly, you are a moron.
@RebekahsRight @CrabbBrendan Louder for the one's in the back 👏👏👏👏
@CrabbBrendan “Authorities suggest”sounds very scientific. 15min is up crab, just fade away now.

@Traderknow1 @YouAreLobbyLud @CrabbBrendan And that's Shaw being amicable! On Shaw's wikipedia page, he apparently aligns it to witchcraft. 

Btw I'm no antiwaxer; just pro body autonomy and anti-hypocrisy.  .

@Traderknow1 @YouAreLobbyLud @CrabbBrendan Dr Berger quotes George Bernard Shaw on his profile page (it's a nice line but way sexist)

I wonder what the Doc thinks of this other quote by Shaw when discussing waccines? https://t.co/CNqK55ZID8
@FrauGosling @CrabbBrendan Arghhh just stay in your basement and let the rest of us live!

@CrabbBrendan 25% of deaths tested positive in the past thirty days.

Imaging if, say, 25% of deaths had eaten at McDonald's or used a novel drug in the past thirty days. That would be massive news.
@CrabbBrendan @RealOzSAGE Not saying anything about the impact of long Covid. This is just a highly questionable claim given the evidence.
